FAVOURITES.notice: There are no articles in Favourites

ABOUT.para1-part1: This application is part of the final project for the Hybrid Web Development course from
ABOUT.para1-part2: We use REST HTTP API to gather articles from various sources and news blogs around the world.
ABOUT.para2: Articles can be accessed in various categories such as general, technology, business, entertainment, health, science, and sports.
ABOUT.para3: Each article includes a link to the original news source which will open in a new window.
